Scilab function

NAME

    set_arc_menu - changes the entries of arc names in scigraph menu

CALLING SEQUENCE

set_arc_menu(arc_names)

PARAMETERS

    • arc_names : a column string matrix with size 10. The list of entries for the arc name menu

DESCRIPTION

    set_arc_menu is used to customize the arc name menu.

EXAMPLES

    gname= SCI+"/demos/metanet/mesh10.graph"
scigraph(graph=gname)        
set_arc_menu("arc menu"+string(1:10)')

SEE ALSO

    set_node_menu
